content: Another electric variation will have him performing an underhanded toss of anywhere between one and three small lightning orbs. They'll bounce along the water for a few hops, and then explode in a much wider area to damage you unless you can dodge to the side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Another electric variation will have him performing an underhanded toss of anywhere between one and three small lightning orbs. They'll bounce along the water for a few hops, and then explode in a much wider area to damage you unless you can dodge to the side.
